| History                 = [[File:Morse Laboratories (Earth-616) 001.jpg|thumb|left|Facility]]
Morse Laboratories was the organization for which [[Carla Unger (Earth-616)|Carla Unger]] worked along with other fellow scientists. She and her coworkers were working on a sample of the [[Carnage (Symbiote) (Earth-616)|Carnage symbiote]] provided by [[Otto Octavius (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]].

The facilities of the organization were later attacked by Carla, who was at the time the host of the Carnage symbiote.{{r|Superior Carnage Annual Vol 1 1}}
